Rayon Sports vs TP Mazembe

Rayon Sports 1-0 TP Mazembe

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:27

Rayon Sports itangiye neza

Gutsinda uyu mukino ni intangiriro nziza kuri Rayon Sports hamwe n'umutoza mushya, umunya-Cameroun Ovambe Olivier, aho batsinze TP Mazembe igitego 1-0. Undi mukino mukino wabaye muri iri tsinda, warangiye KMC yo muri Tanzanie inganyije na Atlabara yo muri Sudani y'Epfo igitego 1-1.

iri tsinda rizagaruka mu kibuga ku wa Kabiri, aho Rayon Sports izakina na Atlabara guhera saa 19:00 mu mukino uzakurikira uzaba wahuje KMC na TP Mazembe.

Tubashimire abo twabanye kuri uyu mukino, tuzasubire ejo ku wa Mbere, ku mukino uzahuza APR FC na Green Eagles FC yo muri Somalia mu itsinda rya gatatu.

17:22

Umukino urarangiye

17:21

90+2' Mazembe ihushije uburyo bwa nyuma

Masengo Godet arenguye umupira mu izamu, Kimenyi Yves asohoka nabi ntiyawufata, Owe na Zatu bashatse kuwushyira mu izamu birangiye ugiye hejuru.

17:19

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane, Ali Sabilla wo muri Uganda, yerekanye iminota ine y'inyongera. Mukanya gato umukino uraza kuba urangiye.

17:19

90' Mazembe ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Ushindi wa Kubanza ahinduye umupira mwiza mu rubuga rw'amahina, mugenzi we Bonyanga Owe ananirwa gukozaho ikirenge mu gihe yarebanaga na Kimenyi Yves.

17:15

85' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Ushindi wa Kubanza akiniye nabi Sekamana Maxime ahagana muri koruneri. Ni coup-franc ya Rayon Sports itewe na Mirafa ugarurwa na myugariro wa Mazembe.

17:10

80' Kimenyi arokoye Rayon Sports

Giovani acomekewe umupira uturutse mu kibuga hagati, asiga ba myugariro ba Rayon Sports, ateye ishoti risubizwa inyuma na Kimenyi Yves ukoresheje amaguru. Bwari uburyo bwiza TP Mazembe yari ibonye ngo yishyuye igitego yatsinzwe hakiri kare.

17:07

78' Gusimbuza

Rayon Sports ikoze impinduka ya nyuma muri uyu mukino. Mugisha Gilbert asimbuye Ciza Hussein wari wabanjemo mu mukino wa mbere yambaye ubururu n'umweru.

17:03

74' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports, Kimenyi Yves ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo. Umusifuzi Hassan Hagi amushinje gutinza umukino n'ubwo we yavugaga ko yababaye.

17:01

73' Gusimbuza

TP Mazembe ikoze impinduka ya nyuma mu mukino, Ipamycelvia Giovani asimbuye Tshibango Tshikuna.

16:59

70' Umutoza mushya wa Rayon Sports mu kazi

Umunya-Cameroun Mathurin Olivier Ovambe ni we watoje uyu mukino wa mbere muri CECAFA Kagame Cup nyuma yo gusimbura umunya-Bresil Roberitnho.

16:56

68' Gusimbuza

Nizeyimana Mirafa asimbuye Commodore Olokwei ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports.

16:50

60' Gusimbuza

Ushindi Wa Kubanza yinjiye mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa Mazembe, asimbuye Rainford Kalaba.

16:49

59' Mazembe ikomeje kotsa igitutu Rayon Sports

Masengo Godet ahinduye imipira ibiri ku ruhande rwa TP Mazembe, uwa mbere utewe na Muleka ukurwaho n'abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports mu gihe undi ukuweho na Saidi n'ukuboko ariko umusifuzi avuga ko nta kosa ryabaye.

16:46

57' Gusimbuza

Likonza Glody wa TP Mazembe asimbuwe na Bonyanga Owe.

16:45

55' Gusatira kwa Mazembe

Abakinnyi ba Mazembe bibwiraga ko bahabwa penaliti ku mupira ukozwe na Iragire Saidi, ariko umusifuzi avuga ko nta cyabaye. Kalaba ateye koruneri ibonetse umupira ushyizweho umutwe na Zatu ujya hanze.

16:43

54' Gusimbuza

Iranzi Jean Claude avuyemo ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports, asimburwa na Sekamana Maxime.

16:42

53' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Tshibango Tshinuka wa TP Mazembe ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo akiniye nabi Ciza Hussein muri metero nka 25.

16:39

49' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Iradukunda Eric akiniwe nabi na myugariro wa Mazembe, ikosa rihanwe na Iranzi Jean Claude uteye umupira muremure uca ku ruhande rw'izamu rya Bakula Aime.

16:37

47' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Miche Mika wa TP Mazembe ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi Mugheni Fabrice mu kibuga hagati. Ikosa rihanwe na Nshimiyimana Amran.

16:34

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Rayon Sports itangije igice cya kabiri. Umupira uri gukinirwa mu kibuga hagati.

16:27

Amwe mu mafoto yaranze KCCA 1-1 Bandari FC

KCCA na Bandari FC zanganyije igitego 1-1 mu mukino wo mu itsinda B wabereye kuri Stade Huye.

16:19

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

16:18

45+1' Koruneri ya Mazembe

Rainford Kalaba ateye umupira ukomeye uciye hejuru gato y'izamu nyuma yo gukorwaho na Kimenyi Yves. Kalaba yitereye uyu mupira, Rayon Sports yirwanaho ikiza izamu.

16:17

45' Iminota ibiri y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane, yerekanye iminota ibiri y'inyongera, Amakipe yombi akomeje gusatirana ariko abakinnyi b'inyuma bakazibira abataha izamu.

16:13

41' Rayon Sports yashimishije abafana

Abafana ba Rayon Sports banyuzwe n'imikinire y'abakinnyi babo kugeza kuri uyu munota. Mukanya gato hashize Olokwei Commodore akinannye na Ulimwengu Jules uteye umupira mu izamu ufatwa na Bakula Aime.

16:06

35' Uburyo kuri TP Mazembe

Likonza Glody agerageje ishoti rikomeye ry'inyuma y'urubuga rw'amahina,umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves afashe umupira umusubirana inyuma ariko arawukomeza.

16:04

32' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Iranzi Jean Claude na Ulimwengu Jules bari bashatse gusatira banyuze ibumoso ariko bagorwa na myugariro wa TP Mazembe, Mondeko Zatu.

15:59

27' Gusatira kwa Mazembe

Tshibango Tshinuka ahaye umupira Miche Mika uteye ishoti rikomeye rica hejuru y'izamu. TP Mazembe yari ibonye ubundi buryo, Likonza Glody aguye mu rubuga rw'amahina, umusifuzi avuga ko nta cyabaye.

15:55

22' Coup-franc ya TP Mazembe

Myugariro wa Rayon Sports, Iragire Saidi akiniye nabi Mondeko Zatu inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina. Umupira utewe na Rainford Kalaba uca ku ruhnade rw'izamu rya Kimenyi Yves.

15:51

20' Umukino uhagaze gato

Umukino uhagazeho gato havurwa umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports, umunya-Ghana Commodore Olokwei uryamye mu kibuga hagati nyuma yo kugonga na mugenzi we wa TP Mazembe.

15:49

17' Gusatira kwa Mazembe

Jackson Muleka azamukanye umupira mu ruhande rw'iburyo, awuhindura mu rubuga rw'amahina, usanga Rainford Kalaba ucitse Rugwiro Herve amuterana umupira ukomeye n'umutwe, ukurwamo na Kimenyi Yves mbere y'uko umusanga hasi akawufata neza. Uyu munyezamu mushya wa Rayon Sports abanje gukorwaho n'abaganga mbere yo gusubira mu izamu.

15:44

13' Umukino urasa n'uwatuje

Rayon Sports yabaye nk'isubira inyuma mu gihe TP Mazembe yazamutse ishaka gusatira ariko na yo hari aho itarenga mu bwugarizi bwa Rayon Sports. Abakinnyi ba Mazembe barimo Kalaba na Zola bari kugerageza gushyira imipira miremire imbere ariko ntigera kuri bagenzi babo.

15:39

7' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Commodore Olokwei ahawe umupira na Mugheni Fabrice wari umaze guherezwa na Rutanga, ahita akorerwaho ikosa na myugariro wa TP Mazembe hafi n'urubuga rw'amahina. Ikosa rihanwe na Commodore, umupira ushyirwaho umutwe na myugariro wa Mazembe.

15:36

4' igitego cya Rayon Sports

Iranzi Jean Claude ahawe umupira na Ulimwengu Jules, Iranzi arakomeza ajya mu ruhande, ahindura umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina usanga Ulimwengu yagezeyo, awushyiea mu izamu arobye umunyezamu Bakula-Ulunde Aime.

15:32

1' Koruneri ya TP MAZEMBE

Tout Puissant Mazembe itangiye isatira, ibona koruneri ebyiri zirimo umupira urengejwe na Iranzi n'umutwe, ariko ntacyo zitanze. Rayon Sports ihise izamuka, Ulimwengu akurwaho umupira.

15:31

Umukino uratangiye

Umukino utangijwe n'umusifuzi Hassan Mohamed Hagi ukomoka muri Somalia. Jackson Muleka atanga umupira kuri Lokonza Glody na we asubiza umupira inyuma.

14:54

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku ruhande rwa TP Mazembe

TP Mazembe iyobowe n'umutoza Mwakasu David dore ko umutoza mukuru na bamwe mu bakinnyi bari mu ikipe y'igihugu ya RDC.

Abakinnyi babanjemo:

Bakula-Ulunde Aime
Rainford Kalaba (c)
Masengo Godet
Zola-Kiaku Arsene
Mwape Tandi
Mwondeko Zatu
Sinkala Nathan
Tshibango Tshikuna
Miche Mika
Muleka Jackson
Likonza Glody

14:54

Abakinnyi bitabajwe ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports

Rayon Sports iri kumwe n'umutoza mushya, Mathurin Ovambe Olivier ukomoka muri Cameroun yamaze gutangaza abakinnyi babanzamo kuri uyu mukino wa TP Mazembe.

Kimenyi Yves
Iragire Saidi
Rugwiro Herve
Iradukunda Eric Radu,
Rutanga Eric (c)
Nshimiyimana Amran
Mugheni Kakule Fabrice
Comodore Olokwei
Ciza Hussein
Iranzi Jean Claude
Ulimwengu Jules

14:50

Imikino imaze kuba muri CECAFA Kagame Cup 2019

Ku wa Gatandatu

APR FC 1-0 Proline FC (Itsinda C)
Heegan FC 0-2 Green Eagles (Itsinda C)

Ku cyumweru

Rayon Sports vs TP Mazembe (itsinda A)
KMC 1-1 Atlbara (Itsinda A)
Bandari 1-1 KCCA (Itsinda B)
Mukura VS vs AZAM FC (Itsinda B

14:48

Ikaze kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera hagiye kubera umukino wa CECAFA Kagame Cup hagati ya Rayon Sports na TP Mazembe mu itsinda A.

Umukino wabanje muri iri tsinda warangiye, KMC yo muri Tanzania inganyije na Atlabara yo muri Sudani y'Epfo igitego 1-1.
